title: Introducing: Dama Scout
content:
This debut single from Glasgow/London outfit Dama Scout showcases colossal potential.

The production feels perhaps a little raw at times, but the songwriting and ideas are all there. Managing to merge Cocteau Twin levels of gracefulness with a blistering sort of energy usually more associated with the likes of Sleater-Kinney. Check out Forget It’s Good below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
